# Issue 3034: improved cleaning code for Debian packages

archive/issues_003034.json:

Some of the "upstream" tarballs automatically generated by sage-debsource aren't entirely clean; I've added code to run debuild clean before generating the upstream tarball.  

Also, cddlib's clean target should use distclean.

**Assignee:** @timabbott

Issue created by migration from https://trac.sagemath.org/ticket/3034
